Function.DocText: AE_ACCOUNT_NAME_To_Check : Use this var so set which account to controle AE_ACCOUNT_ID_To_Check : Use this var so set which account to controle AE_ACCOUNT_Err_Type : Use this var so set Type Of errore used if account not present AE_ACCOUNT_Creation : Use this var to set if you give account name or id ${1} : use this vas to set [ AE_ACCOUNT_To_Check ] ${2} : use this vas to set [ AE_ACCOUNT_Err_Type ] ${3} : use this vas to set [ AE_ACCOUNT_TYPE_INF ] ${4} : use this vas to set [ AE_ACCOUNT_Creation ]

Var to set : None AGBI_ACCOUNT_ID_To_Check : Use this var so set which account to controle AGBI_ACCOUNT_Err_Type : Use this var so set Type Of errore used if account not present ${1} : use this vas to set [ AE_ACCOUNT_To_Check ] ${2} : use this vas to set [ AE_ACCOUNT_Err_Type ] Base usage : Account_Get_By_id "AGBI_ACCOUNT_ID_To_Check" "AGBI_ACCOUNT_Err_Type"
Description : This function is used to check if an id is used on an account
Send Back : Vars [ GLOBAL_id_present ]

Var to set : None AGBN_ACCOUNT_NAME_To_Check : Use this var so set which account to controle AGBN_ACCOUNT_Err_Type : Use this var so set Type Of errore used if account not present ${1} : use this vas to set [ AE_ACCOUNT_To_Check ] ${2} : use this vas to set [ AE_ACCOUNT_Err_Type ] Base usage : Account_Get_By_Name "AGBN_ACCOUNT_NAME_To_Check" "AGBN_ACCOUNT_Err_Type"
Description : This function is used to check if an name is used on an account
Send Back : Vars [ GLOBAL_Name_present ]

ACC_ACCOUNT_To_Check : Use this var so set which account to controle ACC_ACCOUNT_Err_Type : Use this var so set Type Of errore used if account not present ${1} : use this vas to set [ AE_ACCOUNT_To_Check ] ${2} : use this vas to set [ AE_ACCOUNT_Err_Type ]
